description:
Works to trees in front and rear gardens subject to John Spencer Square No.119 TPO 1991 

 FRONT GARDEN 

 3 Limes (T1,T2 & T3) : Crown lift 5m, crown thin throughout entire crown 35%-40%, remove all horizontal laterals growing directly towards building and deadwood 

 REAR GARDEN 

 2 Limes (T4 & T5) : Crown lift 5m, crown thin 35%-40% throughout entire crown and deadwood 

 Maple (T6) : Crown LIft to 3m 

 Prunus (T7) : Crown lift to 4m and crown thin 25% 

 Sycamore (T8) : Remove epicormic growth and deadwood 

 Chestnut (T9) : Crown lift 5m, crown thin 25% and deadwood 

 Sycamore (T10) : Crown thin 25%, remove epicormic growth and deadwood 

 Prunus (Kanzan) (T11) : Crown lift 3m and deadwood 

 Hornbeam (T12) : Crown lift to 3m 

 Lime (T13) : Crown lift 4m, crown thin 30% and deadwood 

 Sycamore (T14) : Crown lift 3m, crown thin 30% and deadwood 

 Prunus (T15) : Crown lift 3m 

 Norway Maple (T16) : Crown lift 3m and deadwood 

 Oak (T17) : Crown lift 3m and deadwood 

 Mountain Ash (T18) : Crown lift 2m and deadwood
decision_conditions:
CONDITION: All the tree work is to be carried out by a competent Tree Surgeon to the recommendation of BS3998: 1989 'Tree Work'. 

 REASON: To protect the health and stability of trees to be retained on the site, and to ensure that a satisfactory standard of visual amenity is provided and maintained.
